ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] SK or Pali
ygData.msgSnippet: Talk about opposites.....hehehehe THe pali stands for good and is a meleeing cleric for the most part.  The SK is a praciticer of the Necro line of spells with
ygData.messageBody:
Talk about opposites.....hehehehe
THe pali stands for good and is a meleeing cleric for
the most part. The SK is a praciticer of the Necro
line of spells with great melee.

I personally think the SK is the better Tank is is
considered to be the second best tank in the game.
However, like in a similar post, SK's are not welcome
everywhere so maybe the good and evil type of thing
might help you decide.

Hope this helps a little

Rob

--- bburk@... wrote:
> I am planning on making a char to be a MT and
> looking for opinions on the best
> race, and whether to make a SK or Pali. I am
> interested in end game best effectiveness,
> not pre lvl 60 function. thanks
>
